attributes.action: Provide more funds and resources to Mental Health services & charities
attributes.additional_details:
I have suffered myself with mental health issues and accessed various charities and services and found them extremely under funded and under staffed for me to be able to access the care I needed.

I now volunteer for various charities and set up my own mental health initiatives as well as fundraise.

I see people every week that require critical care and have accessed all avenues for them to not receive the care they need. Suicide and hospitalisations in mental health are increasing rapidly.
attributes.background: Mental Health services and charities throughout the country are experiencing use like no time before. To provide the optimum service to ensure that end-users get the care that they need these services and charities require additionally funding and resource.

departments.name: Department of Health and Social Care

signatures_by_constituency.mp: Rt Hon Dame Diana Johnson MP
signatures_by_constituency.name: Kingston upon Hull North
Kingston upon Hull West and Hessle
